virtual QString QPlainText::Document::text ( const DocumentRange &  range  )  const [pure virtual]

Obtain text from the document.

Returns:
QString instance containing text, or NULL on error

Creates a new QString instance contaning text or NULL. You should delete the returned instance when it is no longer needed.

Implemented in QPlainText::StandardDocument.

bool QPlainText::Document::textInserted ( const DocumentPosition &  pos,
const QString &  text 
) [signal]

Text has been inserted into document.

Text insertion begins at character pointed to by pos.

bool QPlainText::Document::textRemoved ( const DocumentRange &  range  )  [signal]

Text has been removed from document.

Text removal was betwen characters pointed to by range, including endpoints.
